WorkItem.Description:
I'm trying to load an .xlsx file with the PHPExcel_IOFactory::load() function. In this excelfile is a header image defined and there are also some comments added on several spreadsheets. 

If there are any comments added to an spreadsheet and a header image is also defined in the excel file (see attachment), the Excel2007 Reader is'nt able to load this excelfile and throws following errors:
Notice:  Trying to get property of non-object in Reader/Excel2007.php on line 1368
Warning:  Invalid argument supplied for foreach() in Reader/Excel2007.php on line 1368
Notice:  Undefined offset: 0 in Reader/Excel2007.php on line 1384
Fatal error:  Call to a member function attributes() on a non-object in Reader/Excel2007.php on line 1386
WorkItem.Summary: Excel2007 image header and comments v1.7.7
